title: Composite events

append.description: Adds the given widget(s) in the given order to the composite.
Adds all widgets in the given collection to the composite.

addchild.description: Fired when a child is added. Arguments are `(child, composite, {})`.

removechild.description: Fired when a child is removed. Arguments are `(child, composite, {index: number})`.
